content: St. Augustine recognized that the essence of evil is disordered love. I love having my own way over justice; I love potato chips over health; I love venting my emotions over restraint; I love my opinions over facts and truth. Many romances are characterized by violent emotions, lovers’ quarrels leading to domestic abuse and abortion. The Left’s romance with politics has led to actions at variance with their professed commitment to peace, openness, and responsibility.
